items.content_html: I ordered something this morning from Walmart.com and did the option to pickup today. It is now 5pm and I cannot pick my items up yet. What’s the point, @walmart, if I can’t pick up in a timely manner?
Got a lot done today. Although it was nothing Earth shattering, I got a bunch of small things done. I also added a variety of new ( and old tasks in my head) to OmniFocus.
Think I am going to pull the trigger on SetApp. Looks like the cost will balance out based on apps that I use with paid upgrades vs going with a subscription.
Great summary of Nuxt.js. Nuxt.js — the First Encounter
Fianlly think I got my MBP straightened out. Going to make sure a backup is always running.
Puppy is growing quickly.
Working on using leaflet in a Nuxt based front end. I am having fun trying to get the css correct.
Wife just asked me why I was still awake. It is time for a weekend siesta.

Everytime I think I got the MBP going , I find more missing files. At least they are in SuperDuper. Probably going to need to order a new MacBook pro which angers me. I prefer to order because I can not because I have to. I am also hoping that a new SSD in my 2015 will help as well.
Evil MacBook Pro, you don’t appear to have backup all of my files via Time machine. I am hoping SuperDuper has my back.
2015 MacBook Pro crapped out last night. Spent the day trying to get a backup to restore but that is not going well either. I am wondering if it is a hard drive issue.
It would be great if I could code and test a node based app directly on my iPad. I feel like my productivity would go through the roof.
Trying to look at how I am managing my life again (feels like a 6 month repeating task). I have dropped the ball on some projects and need to get caught up.
Just finished listening to Diamond Age and I got to say I am really disappointed.
Over the past couple of weeks I have become a huge fan of Nuxt and Vue for front-runner development.
Thinking about canceling my DayOne subscription. I am really not getting my money’s worth. Anyone suggest an alternative?
Went to the dog park today.
Bad night for sleep. Woke up early and often.
Continuing to work with Vue. Got frustrated using Sublime Text 3 as my IDE. Just could not get it configured the way I wanted. I decided to try with VSCode. So far I am really pleased.
I am really liking front end development in Vue. There are lots of examples and the documentation is good.
I canceled my hosting plan yesterday. I liked my host but I can just use netify for now.
Over the past several days, I have made a lot off headway getting ArcGIS API for JavaScript 3.25 working in Vue.js. I am hoping to launch the app by the end of the week.
Chilling with Alex and scout.
Been struggling with my Vue project. Getting the ArcGIS JavaScript API working is harder than I thought.
For the past couple of days I have been working on a Vue.js based web app. I am liking Vue so far.
